definition: to beat the drum and sound the gong (idiom); fig. to order an advance or retreat/to egg people on or to call them back
drum/CL:通[tong4],面[mian4]/to drum/to strike/to rouse/to bulge/to swell
to cry (of birds, animals and insects)/to make a sound/to voice (one's gratitude, grievance etc)
gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
